data.eml:eml: Checklist of the Cerambycidae (Insecta, Coleoptera) from central Bahia State (Brazil), with the description of two new species and new geographic records

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nascimento, Francisco E. De L., Botero, Juan Pablo, Bravo, Freddy (2016): Checklist of the Cerambycidae (Insecta, Coleoptera) from central Bahia State (Brazil), with the description of two new species and new geographic records. Zootaxa 4109 (5): 555-568, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4109.5.4
